Title: Janina. Powieść z angielskiego (Janina. A Novel from the English)
Address: Słowackiego 11 (Original address Dom Michelsona. Petersburska 11). Piotrków Trybunalski. Poland

Title: Sierota z Lowood. Powieść z angielskiego z kolorowanemi obrazkami (An Orphan from Lowood. A Novel from the English with Coloured Pictures)
Publisher: Ksiegarnia i Drukarnia Związkowa w Chrzanowie
Address: Główna 8/10. Chrzanów. Poland (Original address E. Bartels. B-Weissensee. Generalstrasse 8/10. Chrzanów. Poland (NB before 1918 Chrzanów was in the Austrian partition. hence the German name of the street that still wasn't changed in the official address 3 years later.))

Title: Dziwne losy Jane Eyre (Strange Fortunes of Jane Eyre)
Comments: The canonical version. later re-edited and reprinted by the state press.
